subject: Copa America (Soccer)
United States Open Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Orr Barouch scored twice and the host Chicago Fire routed the Red Bulls, 4-0, in a U.S. Open Cup quarterfinal match on Tuesday night.
snippet: Orr Barouch scored twice and the host Chicago Fire routed the Red Bulls, 4-0, in a U.S. Open Cup quarterfinal match on Tuesday night.
